name: Quantum Scholars Team
description: Quantum Scholars Team is a research collective focused on quantum computing algorithms. Founded by a group of PhD students, the team collaborates with universities and tech companies. They publish open-source tools, host workshops, and mentor the next generation of scientists. Their work addresses optimization problems, cryptography, and quantum machine learning. The team is driven by a culture of curiosity, collaboration, and open science. They regularly present at international conferences and contribute to academic journals.
